author: chfast
content: This is not about code introspection, but about being able to have factory contacts: a contract which is able to deploy new previously unseen contracts.

author: jochembrouwer
content: Ahhhh gotcha! With the older version supplying the containers to the factory contract was not possible, and with this EIP it is. Had not though about it that way ðŸ™‚ Yup makes sense, thanks! ðŸ˜„
